    • 方法详细资料

      • setSeatstatus

        public static void setSeatstatus(BookingInformation bookingInformation)
                          throws java.io.IOException
        Write the seat selected by the user into the data of the aircraft. When the subsequent user checks in, this seat will be regarded as unselectable.
        参数:
        bookingInformation - entity object contains the passenger's information
        抛出:
        java.io.IOException

      • setCheckinStatus

        public static void setCheckinStatus(BookingInformation bookingInformation)
                             throws java.io.IOException
        set the checkin status to false write the booking information to the checkin database
        参数:
        bookingInformation - entity object contains the passenger's information
        抛出:
        java.io.IOException

      • passDatatoPrinter

        public static void passDatatoPrinter(BookingInformation bookingInformation)
                              throws java.io.IOException
        write the booking information to the printer
        参数:
        bookingInformation - entity object contains the passenger's information
        抛出:
        java.io.IOException

      • searchBookingNo

        public static boolean searchBookingNo(int inputBookingNo,
                                      java.util.ArrayList<BookingInformation> bookingInfoList)
                               throws java.io.IOException
        Use the entered predetermined number to find the files in the database, and write all the matching results into the list.
        参数:
        inputBookingNo - the user input booking number
        bookingInfoList - entity objects list to hold the information
        返回:
        whether found the booking number in the database
        抛出:
        java.io.IOException

      • searchBooingInfo

        public static boolean searchBooingInfo(java.lang.String inputSurName,
                                       java.lang.String inputIDno,
                                       java.util.ArrayList<BookingInformation> bookingInfoList)
                                throws java.io.IOException
        According to the family name and ID number, and write the result into the list.
        参数:
        inputSurName - the user input name
        inputIDno - the user input IDno
        bookingInfoList - entity objects list to hold the information
        返回:
        whether found the booking number in the database
        抛出:
        java.io.IOException

      • searchFlightInfo

        public static void searchFlightInfo(java.lang.String inputFlightNo,
                                    int[] seatStatus)
                             throws java.io.IOException
        Enter the flight number, check the seat status of this flight, and write the result into the array.
        参数:
        inputFlightNo - the flight number to search
        抛出:
        java.io.IOException

      • getPlaneModel

        public static int getPlaneModel(java.lang.String inputFlightNo)
                         throws java.io.IOException
        Use the flight number to check the aircraft model and return the aircraft model.
        参数:
        inputFlightNo -
        返回:
        The model of the aircraft, 1 represents A220 , 2 represents A320
        抛出:
        java.io.IOException
